name: Lexa (singer)
description: '''Léa Cristina Lexa Araújo da Fonseca''' (born February 22, 1995), better known by her stage name '''Lexa''', is a Brazilian singer, songwriter and dancer. In September 2015, Lexa released her debut studio album, titled ''[[Disponível (Lexa album)|Disponível]]''. Five singles were released from this album.
